markup_reference.title: With Mingle's new WYSIWYG editor, you can insert external links as well as create internal Mingle links.

subsection.title: Insert external links inline
subsection.p: To link text to an external site, highlight the desired text and click on the link icon on the editing toolbar. You can also use the keyboard shortcut CTRL + K. Then insert the site's URL into the link widget window and press OK. The text will turn blue to indicate an external link and will be accessible in both "Save" and "Edit" modes.
subsection.note: To edit the external link, either right click or double click the linked text.

subsection.title: Create internal Mingle links inline
subsection.p: Use the following mark-up to create links to cards, attachments, and pages in your and other Mingle projects on your instance. You can also create unique Mingle links with card keywords.
